article_title: Assessing the fitness of wearable tech
article_text:
Devices offer scorecard, feedback on how you’re doing

Trackers like Fitbit can inspire users to reach new fitness levels

Survey, though, shows fitness trackers are not for everyone

article_metadata.title: Assessing the fitness of wearable tech | The Charlotte Observer

og.description: Like many people who grew up long before personal computers and cellphones became ubiquitous, I’ve never tried a fitness tracker. I already know I walk about 5 miles a day, in addition to my daily swim. My weight is stable within a range of 2 pounds. I prefer to remain accountable only to myself, not to a gadget.
